AggOO::modified_agg_app

AggOO::modified_agg_app Class Reference

#include <platform_app.h>

Public Member Functions

void setPixelData (unsigned char *buf, size_t width, size_t height, AggOO::PixelFormat pixFmt)
void postQuit (int code)

Detailed Description

Slightly modified version of agg::platform_support. This will eliminate the need for platform_app, since we can just use the AGG version, but I still want/need some modified behavior.

Set the pixel data.

Remarks:
This sets the raw pixel data, which is converted to the display format.
Parameters:
buf Pointer to the raw pixel data
width Width of the raw buffer
height Height of the raw buffer
pixFmt Format of the raw buffer

void AggOO::modified_agg_app::postQuit ( int  code  ) 

Post the quit message. Basically, the implementation doesn't need to know about the operating system, but if on_key is overridden, then it needs to provide a way to quit the application with the escape key (if the implementor desires it.) Since the app doesn't know about the OS, it doesn't know how to send the quit message. Instead, it should call this function, which DOES know about the OS and can handle the operation.
